COSC461.Greed

Class Location

  • java.lang.Object
    • COSC461.Greed.Location

  • public class Location
extends java.lang.Object
    Current Location of Player. Making this a separate class as opposed to simply encoding it into the array was a conscious design decision. If it were coded into the array, then you could only explore moves (easily) from your actual current position. This allows for "hypothetical" situations to be explored more easily. At the expense of a single extra parameter. It also avoids the problem of having to scan the array to determine the player location on each makeMove.
    Author:
    Adam J. Conover, D.Sc. <aconover@towson.edu>
